Package index

Reading in Papers

pdf2grobid()
Convert a PDF to Grobid XML
read_grobid()
Get paper from grobid XML file
read_cermine()
Get paper from cermine XML file
read_text()
Get paper from text
paper_validate()
Validate Papers

Demo Resources

Get demo XML file
demopdf()
Get demo PDF file

Get demo directory of grobid XML files

Search Papers

Search text
expand_text()
Expand text

Concatenate tables

Get paper information in a table

Get author information in a table

Module Functions

List modules
module_help()
Get Module Help

Get module information

Run a module
module_report()
Report from module output

Create a report
papercheck_app()
Launch Shiny App

LLM Functions

Useful functions for checking GitHub repositories

llm()
Query an LLM
llm_max_calls()
Set the maximum number of calls to the LLM
llm_model()
Set the default LLM model
llm_model_list()
List Available LLM Models

Useful functions for checking OSF URLs

Check OSF API Server Status

Check OSF IDs

Set the OSF delay

Find OSF Links in Papers
osf_retrieve()
Retrieve info from the OSF by ID
summarize_contents()
Summarize Directory Contents
